show_name: Dragon Age: Dawn of the Seeker (movie)
other_title: Dragon Age: Blood Mage no Seisen (Japanese)
ドラゴンエイジ ブラッドメイジの聖戦 (Japanese)
plot: In a country named Orlais where darkness is about to engulf the nation, Cassandra a young heroine who must rises to glory as Templars, mages, and dragons clash. Cassandra must stop a conspiracy that threatens the chantry. Accused of treasonous crimes, Cassandra must fight to regain her honor and overcome her past in order to save Orlais and take her place among the legends.
